rules_text:
Roiling Firestorm deals 5 damage to target creature with flying. If Roiling Firestorm was cast for its memorial cost, it deals 5 damage to each creature with flying instead.
Memorial {3}{G} [i](Whenever a creature you control dies, you may cast this spell from your graveyard for its memorial cost. If you do, exile it as it resolves.)[/i]
